ISSUE.TITLE: Cannot disable gitlab repo.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I cannot disable any gitlab repo on my drone account: ``` drone disable git-server.de/nils/python-skeleton ``` does nothing, does not return anything, does not show any effect either. same with ``` drone delete git-server.de/nils/python-skeleton ``` however ``` drone status git-server.de/nils/python-skeleton ``` shows me the status of the last build.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [Webhook] Replace X-Gitness-Id in payload with X-Gitness-Uid (#937)
